review_data.title: Nothing special, but ok if you're around
review_data.content: The rather usual urban/industrial place in Zurich, with usual prices and slightly different dishes. If you're around, you probably won't be disappointed, Definitely it doesn't worth going on purpose.

review_data.title: Nebenan...daneben!

review_data.title: Plain decoration, good food

review_data.title: super lecker!
